author: Abhishek

review: I bought this specifically so I could stream Netflix on my tv. It worked fine for a few months and then all if a sudden stopped working. I tried to troubleshoot online and found that this is a common problem with Netflix and the Chromecast. I don't know when or if it will ever be fixed but right now it feels like a huge waist of money. I'm very disappointed.
author: Angela Thomas

review: I wasn't sure about this but I ordered it anyway (for $30) and was satisfied enough to buy another.  Sure it has no remote and it's not as cool as a roku (no amazon prime) but what do you expect for the price?  I haven't had much luck casting from my laptop but it could be the laptop's fault.  A great, cheap, help for those unwilling to keep cable.
